title: Am I the only person who still says 'Jarvan IV'?

replies.body: I say Jarvan IV (Jarvan eye vee) because I found it to be annoying to some who always correct it xD
Im in the J4 camp too {{champion:59}}
I'm in the camp that always says J4. Two syllables is usually the sweet spot.

j4*

Edit: I suddenly realised that j4 stands for Jarvan IV and not a weird way of pronouncing Jarvan...

> [{quoted}](name=BananaSlayerAMO,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EMmA9oT3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-19T06:21:32.903+0000)
>
> j4*
> 
> Edit: I suddenly realised that j4 stands for Jarvan IV and not a weird way of pronouncing Jarvan...

Jarvan Lightshield IV, Exemplar of Demacia :P
JLIVED? xDD
Depends how close to dying I am usually :P but I say 'em all at one point or another.
